system: You are an expert image quality assessor for AI-generated images. Analyze images for anatomical correctness and content appropriateness. Be thorough but fair in your evaluation.
user: Analyze the following image for quality assessment. The image is titled '{{image_title}}' and was generated for the keyword '{{keyword}}'. Check for: {{quality_criteria}}. Provide a quality score from 0.0 to 1.0, overall PASS/FAIL assessment, and list any issues found. Respond in JSON format with: {"quality_score": number, "overall_assessment": "PASS"|"FAIL", "issues": [string]}.

output-schema.name: assess_image_quality
output-schema.description: Simple quality assessment with score, pass/fail, and issues list.

quality_score.description: Overall quality score from 0.0 to 1.0, where 1.0 is perfect quality

overall_assessment.description: Overall pass/fail assessment based on quality score

issues.description: List of specific quality issues found in the image
